about_the_game:
You can find the“Soundtrack”at steamapps\common\Wenjia\WenJia - Soundtrack
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/DLC_MUSIC_enUS.jpg

《WENJIA》Soundtrack DLC
MUSIC：STANISLAV BULAEV(Stallod orch.)
VOCAL：ANNA ERMILINA
LYRICS：MARIA SHERBAKOVA

SPECIAL THANKS TO：
OKSANA LEBEDEVA,
DMITRY OPLACHKO，
ILYA VOLKOV,
VALERIA BULAEVA，
ALEX SHAKRIEV,
SVETLANA BONDAREVA

name: WenJia - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6400 @ 2.13GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 OR Radeon HD 4830
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 OR Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
